Kit grunts as she is forced down, and by pure reflex she jerks her head to the side, missing the mine by an inch. She gasps as she sees the mine out of the corner of her eye.

Quickly she pulls her gun out of her leg sheath and tries to move her arm enough so she can point it at this large bot, but he was fairly strong..


------Original Message------
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 11, 2000 6:48:25 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


the large Sinesis goes down, but grabs her and forces her down onto a
mine........which would blow them both up.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Teltoli / Rexon" <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 2:29 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> *Kit dived as she heard a gun setting up to fire, and ended up with her
armour singed on her shoulder. She growls, she hadn't been expecting that.
Kit gets up and laughs, liking the way it echoed around the woods*
>
> *She sidesteps, avoiding a mine, and leaping onto the bot that fired at
her in a feirce tackle*
